biolockj

Class Processor

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.Processor

  • public class Processor
extends Object
    ScriptModules that generate scripts will submit a main script to the OS for execution as a Processor.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Processor.Subprocess
      Class used to submit processes on their own Thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Processor()
      Empty constructor to facilitate subprocess creation

    • Method Detail

      • runJob

        protected String runJob(String[] args,
                        String label)
                 throws IOException,
                        InterruptedException
        Execute the command args and log output with label.
        Parameters:
        args - Command args
        label - Log label
        Returns:
        last line of process output
        Throws:
        IOException - if errors occur reading the InputStream
        InterruptedException - if the thread process is interrupted

      • deregisterThread

        public static void deregisterThread(Thread thread)
        De-register a thread, so it is not considered when shutting down the application.
        Parameters:
        thread - Subprocess thread

      • getBashVar

        public static String getBashVar(String bashVar)
        Return the value of the bash variable from the runtime shell.
        Parameters:
        bashVar - Bash variable name
        Returns:
        Bash env variable value or null if not found (or undefined)

      • runSubprocess

        public static Thread runSubprocess(String[] args,
                                   String label)
        Instantiates a new Processor.
        String[] array used to control spacing between command/params.
        As if executing on terminal args[0] args[1]... args[n-1] as one command.
        Parameters:
        args - Terminal command created from args (adds 1 space between each array element)
        label - to associate with the process
        Returns:
        Thread ID

      • setFilePermissions

        public static void setFilePermissions(String path,
                                      String permissions)
                               throws Exception
        Set file permissions by executing chmod "script.permissions" on generated bash scripts.
        Parameters:
        path - Target directory path
        permissions - Set the chmod security bits (ex 764)
        Throws:
        Exception - if chmod command command fails

      • submit

        public static void submit(ScriptModule module)
                   throws IOException,
                          InterruptedException
        This method is called by script generating ScriptModules to update the script file-permissions to ensure they are executable by the program. Once file permissions are set, the main script (passed in the args param) is executed. Calls setFilePermissions(String, String) and submit(ScriptModule)
        Parameters:
        module - ScriptModule that is submitting its main script as a Processor
        Throws:
        IOException - if errors occur reading the InputStream
        InterruptedException - if the thread process is interrupted

      • submitJob

        public static void submitJob(String[] args,
                             String label)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
        Instantiates a new Processor.
        String[] array used to control spacing between command/params.
        As if executing on terminal args[0] args[1]... args[n-1] as one command.
        Parameters:
        args - Terminal command created from args (adds 1 space between each array element)
        label - - Process label
        Throws:
        IOException - if errors occur reading the InputStream
        InterruptedException - if the thread process is interrupted

      • submitQuery

        public static String submitQuery(String cmd,
                                 String label)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InterruptedException
        Run script that expects a single result
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command
        label - Process Label
        Returns:
        script output
        Throws:
        IOException - if errors occur reading the InputStream
        InterruptedException - if the thread process is interrupted

      • subProcAlive

        public static boolean subProcAlive(Long id)
        Check if a specific process is alive
        Parameters:
        id - - Registered thread ID
        Returns:
        Boolean TRUE only if the ID is alive

      • subProcsAlive

        public static boolean subProcsAlive()
        Check if any Subprocess threads are still running.
        Returns:
        boolean TRUE if all complete
